pageTitle: Quse UI : Minimalistic Compilations : World of Warcraft AddOns
textBeforeTable: Optional Files (2) - Removed oGlow. - Fixed list of AddOns you can update freely. - Replaced teksloot with LootRollMover. - Added pError. - Action bar icons now show hover/pressed/etc... properly. - ncShadow opacity reduced to 50% from 75%. - Weapon Enchant frame is now properly configured. - Totem bar overlapped raid frames, it now has a new home. - Added resto shaman Water Shield stack tracker and minimal Grid2 indicators. - Swapped m_bags with a modified carg_bags simplicity. Clean Icons - Thin, by Suicidalkatt - Removed icon .blp's which were in the Interface folder to reduce file download size. I HIGHLY recommend: 01/09 -Release.1 - TinyDPS border fixed, now 1px. - Shapeshift bar moved above player frame. - Entire UI moved inward by 4 pixels. Added m_Buffs to cover player buffs/debuffs (I'd still like to have debuffs shown over player frame, but having parenting issues). - Cascade should now parent to the minimap (if it doesn't try removing the SavedVariables for this AddOn). - TipTac replaced with FreebTip - NibRunes removed, replaced with a modified guRunes - looks REALLY slick, fantastic run animation! - NibEclipse removed, oUF_NIN covers
